Job Description: Job description      Technical and Soft Skill sets required:     - Extensive knowledge of HTML5,CSS3, jQuery, JavaScript, Core PHP, MySQL, MVC/Laravel, CodeIgniter, Bootstrap, Google API    - Lead the entire web application development life cycle right from concept stage to delivery and post launch support    - Proven software development experience in PHP    - Understanding of open source projects like WordPress, Joomla, Magento, Shopify, Drupal, Wikis, osCommerce, etc    - Good knowledge of relational databases, version control tools and of developing web services    - Document the development process, architecture, and standard components    - Coordinate with co-developers and keeps project manager well informed of the status of development effort and serves as liaison between development staff and project manager    - Keep abreast of new trends and best practices in web development     Qualification requirements:     - Any Graduate/ Postgraduate - in Computer Science
